q_en: What sewing tasks will Elite Sewers be assigned before June 30, 2024?
gt:
Hey there! ğŸ˜„ Let's take a look at the sewing tasks assigned to the "Elite Sewers" before June 30, 2024. Here's what I found:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Order Product ID | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status |
|---------|------------------|------------------|------------------|----------------|------------------|--------|
| 31      | May 26, 2024     | June 4, 2024     | 31               | 260            | 260              | 1      |

Looks like the "Elite Sewers" have a task lined up from May 26 to June 4, 2024, and they've already completed it! ğŸ‰ If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! ğŸ˜Š

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Elite Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group with the name "Elite Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT id, start_time, end_time, order_product_id, planned_number, completed_number, status FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '10' AND end_time < '2024-06-30';
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks assigned to "Elite Sewers" with an end time before June 30, 2024
